title: Cationic lignin as an efficient and sustainable homogenous catalyst for aqueous Knoevenagel condensation reactions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29595-29605
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05763E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ahmed I. A. Soliman, Ameena Bacchus, Rozita Zare, Shrikanta Sutradhar, Pedram Fatehi
A water-soluble, biodegradable, and sustainable catalyst derived from lignin through cationization was utilized for catalyzing the Knoevenagel condensation delivering excellent yields (>96%).
